description_html:
The Sutter is milled out of solid brass right down the street from our studio in Los Angeles. Each piece is then carefully brushed by hand to give it a very soft, satin texture. The Sutter will develop a rich, natural patina as the piece matures with age and use.

The Sutter also comes in a black finish, which is milled out of solid aluminum and then anodized with a flat black finish. This is a timeless design that will look amazing in any space, from your kitchen cabinets to a built in dresser.

You can choose from 2 different widths, 1" or .5"
Dimensions: Width / 1"W OR .5"W x 2"H x 1.25" projection
